remarks: Strong Mathematical Induction for positive integers (inference schema). (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2001.)
statement:
indstr.1 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
indstr.2 $e |- ( x e. NN -> ( A. y e. NN ( y < x -> ps ) -> ph ) ) $.
indstr $p |- ( x e. NN -> ph ) $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d x y $.
